sentences.sContent: He could earn up to a million dollars a year in salary and emoluments from many directorships.
sentences.sCn: 他每年可赚高达一百万美金的薪水另加担任多个董事职位的酬金。

remMethod.val: e + molu(碾碎) + ment → 磨坊主加工粮食后所得的钱 → 报酬

trans.tranOther: Emoluments are money or other forms of payment that a person receives for doing work
